# Everything Codex - LLM Context

This repository is a Codex-first template.

## Ground Rules
- The authoritative project rules are in `AGENTS.md`.
- Codex defaults are in `.codex/config.toml`.
- Reusable skills live in `.codex/skills/`.
- Reusable workflows live in `workflows/`.

## Intent
Provide a clean, Codex-only project baseline with deterministic validation.

## Key Commands
```bash
npm run validate
npm run test
npm run lint
```

## Non-Goals
- No Claude plugin integration.
- No OpenCode integration.
- No compatibility layer for legacy agent ecosystems.
